item.item:
update basic_user_session set
session = __r_session__ ,lastaction = 'session_update' ,lastactiontime = now() ,count_actions = count_actions + 1
where user_code = __user_code__ and ( md5( concat( session, hour(now()) ) ) = __session__ or md5( concat( session, hour(now())-1 ) ) = __session__ )

select user_type,group_code,permissions from basic_user_session where user_code = __user_code__ and ( md5( concat( session, hour(now()) ) ) = __session__ or md5( concat( session, hour(now())-1 ) ) = __session__ )
delete from basic_user_session where user_code = __user_code__ and ( md5( concat( session, hour(now()) ) ) = __session__ or md5( concat( session, hour(now())-1 ) ) = __session__ )

insert into basic_user_session ( user_id ,user_code ,group_code ,groups ,user_type ,permissions ,session ,ip ,client ,gis_lat ,gis_lot ) values ( (select id from basic_user where username = __username__) ,__username__ ,(select group_code from basic_user where username = __username__) ,(select group_all from basic_user where username = __username__) ,(select type from basic_user where username = __username__) ,__permissions__ ,__session__ ,__ip__ ,__client__ ,__gis_lat__ ,__gis_lot__ );

select
basic_user.username, basic_user.money, basic_user.credits, basic_user.group_code, basic_user.group_all, basic_user.id, basic_user.type, basic_user.status, (select photo from oa_person where id = basic_user.id_person) as photo, (select value from basic_parameter where reference = 'basic_user__type' and basic_parameter.code = basic_user.type) as type_, (select value from basic_parameter where reference = 'basic_user__status' and basic_parameter.code = basic_user.status) as status_, (select basic_group.name from basic_group where basic_group.code = basic_user.group_code) as group_name,
basic_user_session.session, basic_user_session.client, basic_user_session.ip
from basic_user left join basic_user_session on basic_user_session.user_code = basic_user.username where basic_user.username = __username__ and ( md5(concat(basic_user.password, hour(now()) )) = __password__ or md5(concat(basic_user.password, hour(now())-1 )) = __password__ ) and EXISTS (select basic_group.code from basic_group where basic_group.code = basic_user.group_code and basic_group.status = '10')
delete from basic_user_session where user_code = __user_code__

select * FROM( SELECT basic_group_2_permission.permission_code,max(credits) as credits,min(cost) as cost from basic_group_2_user , basic_group_2_permission where basic_group_2_user.group_code = basic_group_2_permission.group_code and basic_group_2_user.user_code = __username__ group by permission_code ) temptable ,basic_permission where temptable.permission_code = basic_permission.code order by basic_permission.code
select * from basic_user_session where concat(",",permissions,",") like '%,__actioncode__,%' and user_code = __user_code__ and md5( concat(session,hour(now()) )) = __session__

select
username ,money ,credits ,lastlogintime ,lastlogouttime ,(select name from basic_group where code = basic_user.group_code ) as group_name ,group_code ,type ,id ,status ,time_created ,creater_code ,creater_group_code, (select extend4 from basic_memory where code = basic_user.type and extend5 = 'basic_user__type') as type_, (select extend4 from basic_memory where code = basic_user.status and extend5 = 'basic_user__status') as status_
from basic_user

SELECT
basic_user.username, basic_user.money, basic_user.credits, left(basic_user.lastlogintime,10) as lastlogintime, left(basic_user.lastlogouttime,10) as lastlogouttime, basic_user.count_login, basic_user.count_actions_period, basic_user_session.client, basic_user_session.ip, basic_user_session.session, basic_user.count_actions, basic_user.group_code, basic_user.group_all,
basic_user.id, basic_user.creater_code, basic_user.creater_group_code, left(basic_user.time_created,10) as time_created, left(basic_user.time_lastupdated,10) as time_lastupdated, basic_user.count_updated, basic_user.type, basic_user.status, (select extend4 from basic_memory where code = basic_user.type and extend5 = 'basic_user__type') as type_, (select extend4 from basic_memory where code = basic_user.status and extend5 = 'basic_user__status') as status_,
basic_user.remark
FROM basic_user Left Join basic_user_session ON basic_user.username = basic_user_session.user_code where basic_user.id = __id__

SELECT basic_group.name, basic_group.code, t.user_code FROM basic_group Left Join (select user_code,group_code from basic_group_2_user where user_code = __username__) t ON basic_group.code = t.group_code
order by basic_group.code

SELECT basic_permission.name, basic_permission.code, basic_permission.icon, basic_permission.id,
basic_group_2_permission.cost, basic_group_2_permission.credits
FROM basic_permission left Join ( select * from basic_group_2_permission where group_code = __group_code__ ) basic_group_2_permission ON basic_permission.code = basic_group_2_permission.permission_code
order by basic_permission.code

SELECT basic_group.name, basic_group.code, basic_group.count_users,
type,id,status, (select extend4 from basic_memory where code = basic_group.type and extend5 = 'basic_group__type') as type_, (select extend4 from basic_memory where code = basic_group.status and extend5 = 'basic_group__status') as status_
FROM basic_group

SELECT basic_group.`name`, basic_group.`code`, basic_group.count_users, basic_group.id, basic_group.type, basic_group.`status`, basic_group.remark, basic_group.chief, basic_group.chief_code, basic_group.chief_cellphone, basic_group.phone FROM basic_group
select extend1 as id from basic_memory where type = 2 and code = __code__
update basic_memory set extend1 = (extend1 + 1) where type = 2 and code = __code__
update basic_memory set extend1 = ((select max(id) from __code__)) where type = 2 and code = '__code__'

select tempitem.*,astext(gis_polygon_16.ogc_geom) AS wkt,gis_polygon_16.id AS id_gis from ( SELECT government_building.name, government_building.count_floor, government_building.owner, government_building.owner_type, government_building.population, government_building.photo, (select extend4 from basic_memory where code = government_building.owner_type and extend5 = 'government_building__owner_type' ) as government_building__owner_type, government_building.owner_person_id, government_building.id_gis_polygon, government_building.time_founded, government_building.id, government_building.creater_group_code, government_building.creater_code,
government_building.type, (select extend4 from basic_memory where code = government_building.type and extend5 = 'government_building__type' ) as government_building__type, government_building.status, (select extend4 from basic_memory where code = government_building.status and extend5 = 'government_building__status' ) as government_building__status, government_building.code
FROM government_building
__WHERE__ __ORDER__ __PAGE__) tempitem LEFT JOIN gis_polygon_16 on tempitem.id_gis_polygon = gis_polygon_16.id

SELECT (select name from basic_group where code = left(government_building.code,10) ) as item_10, (select name from basic_group where code = left(government_building.code,8) ) as item_8, (select name from basic_group where code = left(government_building.code,6) ) as item_6, government_building.code, government_building.name, government_building.count_floor, government_building.population, government_building.owner, government_building.owner_type, government_building.owner_person_id, left(government_building.time_founded,10) as time_founded, government_building.photo, government_building.id, government_building.creater_code, government_building.creater_group_code, left(government_building.time_created,10) as time_created, government_building.type, (select extend4 from basic_memory where code = government_building.type and extend5 = 'government_building__type' ) as type_, government_building.status, (select extend4 from basic_memory where code = government_building.status and extend5 = 'government_building__status' ) as status_, government_building.remark FROM government_building
where id = __id__

SELECT (select name from basic_group where code = left(government_family.code,10) ) as item_10, (select name from basic_group where code = left(government_family.code,8) ) as item_8, (select name from basic_group where code = left(government_family.code,6) ) as item_6, government_family.code, government_family.name, government_family.owner, government_family.owner_person_id, left(government_family.time_founded,10) as time_founded, left(government_family.time_over,10) as time_over, government_family.types,
( select group_concat(value) from government_family tempt, ( select extend1,extend4 as value from basic_memory where extend5 = 'government_family__types' ) tempt2 where tempt.id = government_family.id and find_in_set( tempt2.extend1, tempt.types ) ) as types_,
government_family.income, government_family.count_member, government_family.photo, government_family.id, government_family.creater_code, government_family.creater_group_code, (select extend4 from basic_memory where extend5 = 'group' and code = government_family.creater_group_code ) as creater_group_code_, government_family.time_created, government_family.time_lastupdated, government_family.count_updated, government_family.type, (select extend4 from basic_memory where extend5 = 'government_family__type' and code = government_family.type ) as type_,
government_family.status, (select extend4 from basic_memory where extend5 = 'government_family__status' and code = government_family.status ) as status_, government_family.remark FROM government_family

SELECT (select name from basic_group where code = left(government_family.code,10) ) as item_10, (select name from basic_group where code = left(government_family.code,8) ) as item_8, (select name from basic_group where code = left(government_family.code,6) ) as item_6, government_family.code, government_family.name, government_family.owner, government_family.owner_person_id, left(government_family.time_founded,10) as time_founded, left(government_family.time_over,10) as time_over, government_family.types,
( select group_concat(value) from government_family tempt, ( select extend1,extend4 as value from basic_memory where extend5 = 'government_family__types' ) tempt2 where tempt.id = government_family.id and find_in_set( tempt2.extend1, tempt.types ) ) as types_,
government_family.photo, government_family.income, government_family.count_member, government_family.id, government_family.creater_code, government_family.creater_group_code, (select extend4 from basic_memory where extend5 = 'group' and code = government_family.creater_group_code ) as creater_group_code_,
left(government_family.time_lastupdated,10) as time_lastupdated, left(government_family.time_created,10) as time_created,
government_family.count_updated, government_family.type, (select extend4 from basic_memory where extend5 = 'government_family__types' and code = government_family.type ) as type_,
government_family.status, (select extend4 from basic_memory where extend5 = 'government_family__status' and code = government_family.status ) as status_, government_family.remark FROM government_family
where id = __id__

SELECT (select name from basic_group where code = left( government_resident.code,10) ) as item_10, (select name from basic_group where code = left( government_resident.code,8) ) as item_8, (select name from basic_group where code = left( government_resident.code,6) ) as item_6, government_resident.code, government_resident.id, government_resident.name, government_resident.job_code, government_resident.relation, government_resident.time_in, government_resident.time_out, government_resident.person_id, government_resident.job, government_resident.job_code,
government_resident.`type`, government_resident.types, government_resident.`status`, (select extend4 from basic_memory where extend5 = 'government_resident__type' and code = government_resident.type ) as type_, (select extend4 from basic_memory where extend5 = 'government_resident__relation' and code = government_resident.relation ) as relation_, (select extend4 from basic_memory where extend5 = 'industry' and code = government_resident.job_code ) as government_resident__job, (select extend4 from basic_memory where extend5 = 'government_resident__status' and code = government_resident.status ) as status_ FROM government_resident

SELECT government_resident.code, government_resident.name, left(government_resident.time_in,10) as time_in, left(government_resident.time_out,10) as time_out, government_resident.person_id, government_resident.types, government_resident.job, government_resident.job_code, government_resident.relation, government_resident.id, government_resident.creater_code, government_resident.creater_group_code, left(government_resident.time_created,10) as time_created, left(government_resident.time_lastupdated,10) as time_lastupdated, government_resident.count_updated, government_resident.`type`, government_resident.`status`, government_resident.remark,
(select extend4 from basic_memory where extend5 = 'government_resident__relation' and code = government_resident.relation ) as relation_, (select extend4 from basic_memory where extend5 = 'industry' and code = government_resident.job_code ) as government_resident__job, (select extend4 from basic_memory where extend5 = 'government_resident__type' and code = government_resident.type ) as type_, (select extend4 from basic_memory where extend5 = 'government_resident__status' and code = government_resident.status ) as status_
FROM government_resident
where government_resident.id = __id__

SELECT oa_person.name, left(oa_person.birthday,10) as birthday, oa_person.card, (select extend4 from basic_memory where extend5 = 'oa_person__card' and code = oa_person.card ) as card_,
oa_person.photo, oa_person.height, oa_person.nationality, oa_person.gender, (select extend4 from basic_memory where extend5 = 'oa_person__gender' and code = oa_person.gender ) as gender_, oa_person.nation, (select extend4 from basic_memory where extend5 = 'oa_person__nation' and code = oa_person.nation ) as nation_, oa_person.marriage, (select extend4 from basic_memory where extend5 = 'oa_person__marriage' and code = oa_person.marriage ) as marriage_, oa_person.degree, (select extend4 from basic_memory where extend5 = 'oa_person__degree' and code = oa_person.degree ) as degree_,
oa_person.politically, (select extend4 from basic_memory where extend5 = 'oa_person__politically' and code = oa_person.politically ) as politically_,
oa_person.id, oa_person.cellphone, oa_person.email, oa_person.qq, oa_person.address_birth, oa_person.address_birth_code, oa_person.degree_school, oa_person.degree_school_code, oa_person.address, oa_person.address_code, oa_person.cardid FROM oa_person
where id = __id__

SELECT oa_plan.code, oa_plan.name, left(oa_plan.plan_time_start,10) as time_start, left(oa_plan.plan_time_stop,10) as time_stop, UNIX_TIMESTAMP(oa_plan.plan_time_start) as from_, UNIX_TIMESTAMP(oa_plan.plan_time_stop) as to_, oa_plan.plan_personhour, oa_plan.plan_money, oa_plan.plan_output, oa_plan.result_time_start, oa_plan.result_time_stop, oa_plan.result_personhour, oa_plan.result_money, oa_plan.result_output, oa_plan.count_work, oa_plan.count_plan, oa_plan.group_incharge, oa_plan.groups_participate, oa_plan.user_incharge, oa_plan.quotes, oa_plan.quotes_weight, oa_plan.deviation, oa_plan.appraise, oa_plan.id, oa_plan.creater_code, oa_plan.creater_group_code FROM oa_plan
SELECT oa_person.name,basic_user.username, (select extend4 from basic_memory where basic_memory.code = basic_user.group_code limit 1) as groupname, basic_user.group_code FROM basic_user,oa_person

SELECT oa_plan.code, oa_plan.name,
left(oa_plan.plan_time_start,10) as plan_time_start, left(oa_plan.plan_time_stop,10) as plan_time_stop, oa_plan.plan_personhour, oa_plan.plan_money, oa_plan.plan_output, oa_plan.result_time_start, oa_plan.result_time_stop, oa_plan.result_personhour, oa_plan.result_money, oa_plan.result_output, oa_plan.count_work, oa_plan.count_plan, oa_plan.group_incharge, oa_plan.user_incharge, oa_plan.groups_participate, oa_plan.groups_weight, oa_plan.quotes, oa_plan.quotes_weight, oa_plan.deviation, oa_plan.appraise, oa_plan.id, oa_plan.creater_code, oa_plan.updater_code, oa_plan.creater_group_code, oa_plan.time_created, oa_plan.time_lastupdated, oa_plan.count_updated, oa_plan.`type`, oa_plan.`status`,
oa_plan.files, oa_plan.content,
oa_plan.remark FROM oa_plan where id = __id__
SELECT basic_group.name, basic_group.code FROM basic_group
SELECT oa_plan.code, oa_plan.name FROM oa_plan
SELECT left(oa_plan.plan_time_start, __size__) as time_ ,count(*) as count_ FROM oa_plan

SELECT oa_plan.`code`, oa_plan.`name`, oa_plan.content, oa_plan.files, left(oa_plan.plan_time_start,10) as plan_time_start, left(oa_plan.plan_time_stop,10) as plan_time_stop, oa_plan.plan_personhour, oa_plan.plan_money, oa_plan.plan_output, oa_plan.result_time_start, oa_plan.result_time_stop, oa_plan.result_personhour, oa_plan.result_money, oa_plan.result_output, oa_plan.count_work, oa_plan.count_plan, oa_plan.group_incharge, oa_plan.user_incharge, oa_plan.groups_participate, oa_plan.groups_weight, oa_plan.quotes, oa_plan.quotes_weight, oa_plan.deviation, oa_plan.appraise, oa_plan.id, oa_plan.creater_code, oa_plan.updater_code, oa_plan.creater_group_code, oa_plan.time_created, oa_plan.time_lastupdated, oa_plan.count_updated, oa_plan.type, oa_plan.`status`, oa_plan.remark,
(select extend4 from basic_memory where extend5 = 'oa_plan__type' and code = oa_plan.type ) as type_, (select extend4 from basic_memory where extend5 = 'oa_plan__status' and code = oa_plan.status ) as status_
FROM oa_plan __WHERE__ __ORDER__ __PAGE__

SELECT oa_work.code, oa_work.code_from, oa_work.plan, (select name from oa_plan where code = oa_work.plan limit 1 ) as plan_, oa_work.title, left(oa_work.`time`,10) as time, oa_work.`hour`, oa_work.content, oa_work.businesstype, (select basic_parameter.value from basic_parameter where code = oa_work.businesstype and reference = 'oa_work__businesstype' limit 1) as businesstype_,
oa_work.id, oa_work.updater_code, oa_work.creater_code, oa_work.creater_group_code, oa_work.time_created, oa_work.time_lastupdated, oa_work.count_updated, oa_work.`type`, (select basic_parameter.value from basic_parameter where code = oa_work.type and reference = 'oa_work__type' limit 1) as type_, oa_work.`status`, (select basic_parameter.value from basic_parameter where code = oa_work.status and reference = 'oa_work__status' limit 1) as status_, oa_work.remark FROM oa_work
select * from government_company

SELECT
government_company.`code`, government_company.`name`, government_company.code2, government_company.tax, government_company.address, government_company.`owner`, government_company.id_owner, government_company.cellphone, government_company.phone, government_company.business, government_company.business_code, government_company.longitude, government_company.latitude, government_company.code_building,
government_company.time_in, government_company.time_out, government_company.path_photo, government_company.type, government_company.`status`, government_company.count_employee, government_company.property, government_company.`turnover `,
government_company.id, government_company.creater_code, government_company.creater_group_code, government_company.time_created, government_company.time_lastupdated, government_company.count_updated, government_company.remark
FROM government_company
where government_company.id = __id__
